BBEX3.A.BRL.EUR.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the euro in Brazil / EUR 1 = BRL ... (middle)
Source: Since April 2000: Banco Central do Brasil, Brasilia. 1999 - March 2000: Dresdner Bank Lateinamerika AG, Hamburg.

Methodology: Until 2007, calculated on the basis of daily buying and selling rates, from 2008 to 2011 on the basis of mid-month and month-end buying and selling rates, and from 2012 on the basis of month-end buying and selling rates.
